Key Match Events: The Clippers played on the road losing to the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday night 126-103.
Pre-Game Insights: Kawhi Leonard was set to play in his third game of the season against the Nuggets after missing the start of the season with inflammation in his surgically repaired right knee.
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Tyronn Lue expressed support for Kawhi Leonard's decision to take care of his family during the wildfires.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kawhi Leonard has reportedly taken a leave of absence from the team to be with members of his family who were affected by the ongoing wildfires in the L.A. area.
